oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The !kun call spirits (or dreams) ||gan-a. Other people in their country (namely the Makoba and the Ovaherero) call them different things when they speak of them. 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-5.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ||gan-a (spirits or dreams)
